subject: Fwd: Updates to Discord’s Policies
plainBody:

To: <rosius@846agents.com>




---------- Forwarded message ---------

Hey!

We wanted to let you know that we’re updating our Terms of Service
<https://click.discord.com/ls/click?upn=u001.a0NJ38DJJG1sulNx5wS1jmao-2Fh5RR-2FeFYeaMHcy0KFYTtAMSPr82uEshGSfeH3VCeojs_ueq-2FLXI3TYzOzwDihOIgI-2FTxvr3nJhcapD53cyke8HjqGPAan8ydpOREh59ymJshQK-2FNFEKyRb-2FGY0U92KUGedLCoeGM8BOJ7907QOuhKrovx6BzI-2FwBlhK-2FzGFLmrYBFikVWPxm9bFK9BreTqqFlaPKaKuy3vAw4BpOPiuObvaUHUCkubVtsNJHpz6yEOfahQ54vLFsb1jERmz-2F0ZgvadoZCvBynOqqnyRg2uWtNS9LWwtvo-2F-2BkB1xZNvMpRxow>,
Privacy Policy
<https://click.discord.com/ls/click?upn=u001.a0NJ38DJJG1sulNx5wS1jomd9jf597FKWsPi-2B9X02IDEpKDJSjBzC5VkPdtwK3LafUEL_ueq-2FLXI3TYzOzwDihOIgI-2FTxvr3nJhcapD53cyke8HjqGPAan8ydpOREh59ymJshHsg5Luxhy2bpHvTp14VPjV5SLqjANN5uePBuEeDTshpDOEhO5SlywgxxdQ1L5xo5KbFa3U-2FQGJcjrAy6XhZ49uY9no36uuyeruQJw1Hr-2BLlxkRz4nbvU7tMpm079GibGbkRCe7zI-2FuPqJMJ6ylAGcSHyDeaPhuLCfGxtZC8b8uci-2BD7IpdH9jHLWRUWnyVXh>,
Paid Services Terms
<https://click.discord.com/ls/click?upn=u001.a0NJ38DJJG1sulNx5wS1jmao-2Fh5RR-2FeFYeaMHcy0KFb6k-2FKMKHxHHQPwZclEu8z9y9wp0u-2BUFazP-2B2tAehJYow-3D-3DLlgi_ueq-2FLXI3TYzOzwDihOIgI-2FTxvr3nJhcapD53cyke8HjqGPAan8ydpOREh59ymJsh7LSHyRpTxGteCdAYkw9x7xZdeXYUf0FIrWQlS2fl-2B7vAGcABq2JaYU6snY2tzyl1-2F4CluaTPN3qB8Xp2PJfWaEL8Rz5hV9hcJQv4n2kJZvN55gn5dGLrhuY1tbzti-2FwJLjdzL-2BTMwlycKuR-2BbV0CEu8R-2BHbTjniAvl4b7Iz-2FVPLanYSdwa4j1WWWM4aM8hGW>,
and Community Guidelines
<https://click.discord.com/ls/click?upn=u001.a0NJ38DJJG1sulNx5wS1jpbCCT6E-2BgXKgNwnLEukEEGUbWbUb7yR8oHIv6SA3eVfkY_W_ueq-2FLXI3TYzOzwDihOIgI-2FTxvr3nJhcapD53cyke8HjqGPAan8ydpOREh59ymJshcZQXdaxO6qZ9CULL9dKjOVCbojUOj4HFqpphNUD2sBfIRx3jANkzFDp3rJt-2B3A58YTel161EBGTKBbwlz-2B9c0Oq4POAwJwljE90emSDcaQRKjkC0Iv0IeU57Qe38PtIfUMHWg9DOGQsbl69MVogJlnTscV72lYUlAGSa0iCI7xrhqLaCwgXDtigZrqBivB6f>.
These updates will support our evolving business, address changes in laws,
and provide additional clarity about what we expect from you and what you
can expect from us as you use our services.

These changes will take effect on *September 29, 2025*. Use of our services
from that date will be subject to the updated policies.

We encourage you to review the updated documents in full. We've also
summarized important changes in our article here
<https://click.discord.com/ls/click?upn=u001.a0NJ38DJJG1sulNx5wS1jhNGCBLBXgwpsgIobogv2M6mmdbkBJilWqd8VZK9QLhql0mx_ueq-2FLXI3TYzOzwDihOIgI-2FTxvr3nJhcapD53cyke8HjqGPAan8ydpOREh59ymJshdgOadM1FdKTD-2BgZZNJZxuJ7Y0rm46o-2FsEQDqIeVzVkn-2BhMveCi2kN-2FHN218LWDfnqXiiZkF-2FWpHsHwkze-2F0oYErfbGrGd27MRRewCsnOgdku5riSjY-2F2S-2FKMZrRXXKFLQUNXUgsv-2Fgw3XQGNsr5ZPfyrpafkuDvMheXCX6p-2BAlRa6zda15ZXlYxyRmos-2B-2B9o>.
If you disagree with any of the policies, you may terminate your agreement
with us at any time by discontinuing use of our services and deleting your
Discord account.

Thanks for helping us make Discord the place to build meaningful
connections around the joy of playing games!

If you received this notice earlier, please note that the linked documents
have been updated with the new policies. Please review those, as they will
apply starting on September 29, 2025.

   - Discord
